titleStmt.title: A Codex Containing Orestes and Bacchae

availability.p: © Digital Corpus of Literary Papyri. This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 License .

encodingDesc.p: This file encoded to comply with EpiDoc Guidelines and Schema version 8 http://www.stoa.org/epidoc/gl/5/

revisionDesc.change: Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - A complicated text. In a.r.1 accent ἔμπειρος; the use of vac.? in fr. a.r. should be done away with, as it disguises the left margin of the column; delete a.r.8 and renumber; accent οἱ in a.r.10; encode [.?] at end of a.r.13-14; accent ἁ in a.v.3; make iota adscript in a.v.3; check apostrophes throughout; check superstrokes in a.v.6, 8, and 9; remove .1 at end of a.v.8-9; add extra space before scribal accent in a.v.10; add scribal circumflex at end of a.v.10 and a.v.11 (where dots are also missing); remove extra spaces in a.v.12-13; add dots in fr. b.r.right.6; add scribal grave in fr. b.r.right.7; fix spelling in fr. b.r.right.7; remove extra space in fr. b.r.right.10; make iota adscript and add missing dots in fr. b.r.right.10; make iota adscript and accent οὓς in fr. b.r.right.11; make iota adscript in fr. b.r.right.12a; add missing dots in fr. b.r.right.14; add lost.?lin to top and bottom of fr. b.r.right; fix the order of |reg| tags in fr. b.v.left.2; dot hypsilon in fr. b.v.left.4; make iota adscript in fr. b.v.left.5; add scribal apostrophe in fr. b.v.left.6; dot first letter of fr. b.v.left.8; make iota adscript in fr. b.v.left.8; put braces around ἐπ in fr. b.v.left.10; add extra space before scribal breathing in fr. b.v.left.11; remove extra spaces in fr. b.v.left.12-14; fix the scribal accent in fr. b.v.right.4; add scribal apostrophe in fr. b.v.right.10; fix placement of superscript in fr. b.v.right.18; remove extra spaces in fr. b.v.right.19-21; I prefer |alt| tags in fr. b.v.right.23; encode φε.1 in fr. b.r.left.ms,1; add scribal acute in fr. b.r.left.1; add spaces in fr. b.r.left.6 and accent λήμασιν; I prefer |alt| tags in fr. b.r.left.9; regularize in fr. b.r.left.12; encode [.?].1[.?].2 at start of fr. b.r.left.25; for fragment c both sides need lost.?lin at top and bottom; I think fr. c.r.11 can be deleted; I think the scribal mark in fr.c.v.2 is more likely apostrophe than lenis. Review all metadata before finalization.
Commit - revisit and ask about the marginal pieces that seem to be marked in the edition, as well as how to properly add page #'s and whether the interlinear text has been marked properly.
Finalized - This is good to go.

Vote - Accept-Straight-to-Finalization - A complicated text. In a.r.1 accent ἔμπειρος; the use of vac.? in fr. a.r. should be done away with, as it disguises the left margin of the column; delete a.r.8 and renumber; accent οἱ in a.r.10; encode [.?] at end of a.r.13-14; accent ἁ in a.v.3; make iota adscript in a.v.3; check apostrophes throughout; check superstrokes in a.v.6, 8, and 9; remove .1 at end of a.v.8-9; add extra space before scribal accent in a.v.10; add scribal circumflex at end of a.v.10 and a.v.11 (where dots are also missing); remove extra spaces in a.v.12-13; add dots in fr. b.r.right.6; add scribal grave in fr. b.r.right.7; fix spelling in fr. b.r.right.7; remove extra space in fr. b.r.right.10; make iota adscript and add missing dots in fr. b.r.right.10; make iota adscript and accent οὓς in fr. b.r.right.11; make iota adscript in fr. b.r.right.12a; add missing dots in fr. b.r.right.14; add lost.?lin to top and bottom of fr. b.r.right; fix the order of |reg| tags in fr. b.v.left.2; dot hypsilon in fr. b.v.left.4; make iota adscript in fr. b.v.left.5; add scribal apostrophe in fr. b.v.left.6; dot first letter of fr. b.v.left.8; make iota adscript in fr. b.v.left.8; put braces around ἐπ in fr. b.v.left.10; add extra space before scribal breathing in fr. b.v.left.11; remove extra spaces in fr. b.v.left.12-14; fix the scribal accent in fr. b.v.right.4; add scribal apostrophe in fr. b.v.right.10; fix placement of superscript in fr. b.v.right.18; remove extra spaces in fr. b.v.right.19-21; I prefer |alt| tags in fr. b.v.right.23; encode φε.1 in fr. b.r.left.ms,1; add scribal acute in fr. b.r.left.1; add spaces in fr. b.r.left.6 and accent λήμασιν; I prefer |alt| tags in fr. b.r.left.9; regularize in fr. b.r.left.12; encode [.?].1[.?].2 at start of fr. b.r.left.25; for fragment c both sides need lost.?lin at top and bottom; I think fr. c.r.11 can be deleted; I think the scribal mark in fr.c.v.2 is more likely apostrophe than lenis. Review all metadata before finalization.
Commit - revisit and ask about the marginal pieces that seem to be marked in the edition, as well as how to properly add page #'s and whether the interlinear text has been marked properly.
